roleset.name: remove, erasure

example.name: no source
example.text: SHAREDATA Inc. said it will amend a registration statement filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission to delete a plan to sell 500,000 newly issued common shares .

propbank.arg: a plan to sell 500,000 newly issued common shares

example.name: with source
example.text: American Medical International Inc. , a New York hospital operator , will be deleted from the index at that time .

propbank.arg: American Medical International Inc. , a New York hospital operator

example.name: passive/adjectival
example.text: As the violinist tells it , his grandmotherly looking teacher `` put her hands on her hips , stomped her foot and said , ` You 've just got to get the [ expletive deleted ] out of there . '' '

example.name: All args
example.text: Her deletion of the files from the computer made her look guilty .

example.name: args 1 and PRP
example.text: The deleting of messages to make room for new ones takes it even further - I hope criminal prosecutions follow because this has gone way too far .

propbank.arg: to make room for new ones

example.name: reversed 1 and 2
example.text: The Respondent 's conduct in insisting that the laboratory technician draw an improper blood sample , and his deleting from the resulting laboratory slip the notation regarding how the sample was taken with the intention of creating false documentation of his alcohol level , constitutes conduct evidencing moral unfitness and fraud .

propbank.arg: the notation regarding how the sample was taken
with the intention of creating false documentation of his alcohol level

roleset.note: DELETE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'delete' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 10.1. (from delete.01-v predicate notes)
DELETING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, delete-v.01, deletion.01. Corresponds to VNcls remove-10.1. (from deleting.01-n)
